```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

```


```{r p1 file name and path vars}

file_names = list.files("./data")

paths = tibble(file_names) %>% 
  mutate(file_names = str_c("./data/", file_names))

```


```{r p1 function}

readin = function(x) {
  read_csv(file = x)
}

```

```{r p1 read in and clean}

study_data = 
  paths %>% 
  mutate(data = map(file_names, readin))

```
